articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: AP PHOTOS: Little relief as record temperatures sizzle around the world - The Associated Press
articles.description: A wave of heat is not loosening its grip on the globe. Phoenix has broken its own streak of blistering hot days, southern Europeans and millions of people on vacation there broiled under near-record temperatures, while parts of the Middle East tested the limi…
articles.content:
